summary: This is a track I wrote to be put into Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This is a track I wrote to be put into Skyrim. It can replace any file you want. I'd recommend the main theme or an exploration one. More on the way soon!

----------> Version 2 is up, I made changes based on user comments: added reverb and removed unseemly gaps.
[u]
INSTALLATION[/u]

It is supplied in .xwm format and by default will replace the main menu music, just extract to your data folder.

To replace the main theme title the track "mus_maintheme.xwm" and place it in Data\music\special.
Full lists of other tracks can be found online.

[u]UNINSTALLATION[/u]

Remove the file.

Youtube video in the right tab.

Check out my youtube channel here https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3GNU1ZhYs2oCVpqUGN1moA

Written in Sibelius and converted with the Skyrim Audio Converter, check it out here!Â http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8303/?
author: Xen
